TraitComponent [3].name: Elite Fore: Lord of the Corpse Hall
TraitComponent [3].desc: This chracter cannot be {b} Stunned {/b} and markers they have generated cannot be removed. Be sure to inform players of this before beginning the encounter.

TraitComponent [4].name: Against Adversity
TraitComponent [4].desc: Odin's Max HP is 125 per Enemy they are facing. If Odin is facing more than 4 enemies they perform one additional Primary Action.

TraitComponent [5].name: Master of the Dread Arm
TraitComponent [5].desc: Odin's [Zantetsuken] deals +2D6 damage if Odin is adjacent to a [Gungnir], consuming the [Gungnir] and causing the {b} Unworthy {/b} enfeeblement to the target, which has the following effects: {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character incurs a -2 penalty on all checks. {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character has its speed reduced by 2. {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character cannot wield a [Shard of Gungnir]. {lb} * {b} Unworthy {/b} removes the {b} Worthy {/b} enhancement. {lb} * {b} Unworthy {/b}  is removed when a character takes 10 or more damage from a single source, deals 10 or more damage in a single attack, or hals 10 or more HP in a single ability.

effects.Trigger:: At the start of the encounter and each round, immediately before the [Adventurer Step] begins
effects.Base Effect:: Odin prepares the following based on the round. Combining if overlapping: {lb} * {a} The First Test {/a} (Round 1, 3, & 6) Immediately prepare {a} Gungnir {/a} {lb} * {a} The Second Test {/a} (Round 2, 4, & 6) Immediately prepare {a} Eunherjar {/a} {lb} * {a} The Third Test {/a} (3, 5, & 6) Immediately prepare {a} Gagnrath {/a}  {lb} * {a} The Final Test {/a} (Round 7 or When Odin = 75 HP or less) Enter Phase 2 and Immagiately prepare {a} Shit Zantetsuken {/a}
Attack using {a} Zantetsuken {/a} , then immediately use {a} Woden Valkut {/a} , {a}  Hall of Melancholy {/a} , {a} Sanngetall {/a} .
Deal 10 Damage to the target and all its adjacent allies

effects.Marker Area:: A stationary 6x6 area centered on the origin
effects.Target:: All enemies within the marker area
effects.Marker Trigger:: The beginning of this chracter's nect turn
effects.Marker Effect:: Deals 6d6 damage to all targets and any target that remains at 1 HP is graated the {b} Worthy {/b} enhancement, which has the following effects: {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b} chracter gains +2 bonus to all checks {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b}  chracter has its speed increased by 2 {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b} character can use a held [Shard of Gungnir] as an [Instant] {lb} * {b} Worthy {/b} removes the {b} Unworthy {/b} enfeeblement

effects.Orgin:: Two squares occupied by two separate enemy characters without Enmity
effects.Marker Area:: A stationary 5x5 area centered on the origin
effects.Target:: All enemies within the marker area
effects.Marker Trigger:: The beginning of this character's next turn
effects.Marker Effect:: Deals 4d6 damage and any target that takes 10 or more damage by this (after damage reduction) gains the {b} Unworthy {/b} enfeeblement, which has the following effects: {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character incurs a -2 penalty on all checks. {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character has its speed reduced by 2. {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character cannot wield a [Shard of Gungnir]. {lb} * {b} Unworthy {/b} removes the {b} Worthy {/b} enhancement. {lb} * {b} Unworthy {/b}  is removed when a character takes 10 or more damage from a single source, deals 10 or more damage in a single attack, or hals 10 or more HP in a single ability

effects.Marker Area:: A mobile 1x1 marker centered on one enemy with Enmity or the highest amount of Hit Points
effects.Target:: All enemies within the marker area
effects.Marker Trigger:: The beginning of this chracter's next turn
effects.Marker Effect:: Deals 8d6 damage to the target and if the target remains a t or above 1 HP it grants the {b} Worthy {/b} enhancement to them, which has the following effects: {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b} chracter gains +2 bonus to all checks {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b}  chracter has its speed increased by 2 {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b} character can use a held [Shard of Gungnir] as an [Instant] {lb} * {b} Worthy {/b} removes the {b} Unworthy {/b} enfeeblement

effects: {i} An emanation of Odin's dark power, draining your very will {/i}
effects.Target:: All enemies within the marker area
effects.Marker Trigger:: The beginning of this character's next turn
effects.Marker Effect:: Deals 3d6 damage to all targets and causes {b} DOT(5) {/b}

effects.Origin:: 3 non-adjacent points on one edge of the encounter map
effects.Marker Area:: A stationary 1x16 area extending in a straight line from the origin
effects.Target:: All enemies within the marker area
effects.Marker Trigger:: The beginning of this character's next turn
effects.Marker Effect:: Deals 8d6 damage to all target and any taget that take 10 or more damage by this (after damage reduction) gain the {b} Unworthy {/b} enfeeblement, which has the following effects: {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character incurs a -2 penalty on all checks. {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character has its speed reduced by 2. {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character cannot wield a [Shard of Gungnir]. {lb} * {b} Unworthy {/b} removes the {b} Worthy {/b} enhancement. {lb} * {b} Unworthy {/b}  is removed when a character takes 10 or more damage from a single source, deals 10 or more damage in a single attack, or hals 10 or more HP in a single ability

effects.Origin:: Two squares occupied by two separate enemy characters without enmity
effects.Marker Area:: A mobile 5x5 area centered on the origin
effects.Target:: All enemies within the marker area
effects.Marker Trigger: The beginning of this character's next turn
effects.Marker Effect:: Deals 3d6 damage and summons a [Gungnir] in an unoccupied adjacent area to the center

TraitComponent [3].name: Dreadful Tension
TraitComponent [3].desc: This character does not take a turn, instead at the end of the [Adventurer Step] it deals 5 damage to all enemies and causes the {b} Unworthy {/b} enfeeblement, which has the following effects: {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character incurs a -2 penalty on all checks. {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character has its speed reduced by 2. {lb} * An {b} Unworthy {/b} character cannot wield a [Shard of Gungnir]. {lb} * {b} Unworthy {/b} removes the {b} Worthy {/b} enhancement. {lb} * {b} Unworthy {/b}  is removed when a character takes 10 or more damage from a single source, deals 10 or more damage in a single attack, or hals 10 or more HP in a single ability

TraitComponent [4].name: Worthy Prize
TraitComponent [4].desc: When a chracter reduces a [Gungnir] to 0 HP, they gain the {b} Worthy {/b} enhancement, which has the following effects: {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b} chracter gains +2 bonus to all checks {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b}  chracter has its speed increased by 2 {lb} * A {b} Worthy {/b} character can use a held [Shard of Gungnir] as an [Instant] {lb} * {b} Worthy {/b} removes the {b} Unworthy {/b} enfeeblement

TraitComponent [5].name: Elder Arm
TraitComponent [5].desc: When this character is reduced to 0 HP, it is not removed from the battlefield. Instead inform the player that, "The Mighty Gungnir will be wielded by the Worthy." If they interact with the defeated [Gungir] using a Primary or Secondary Action they gain [Shard of Gungnir] and acces to the following [Duty Actions]. After a [Duty Action] is used tehy lose [Shard of Gungnir]. {lb} * {a} Boon of Steel {/a} (Primary, Ranged 10) You divide 10 damage reduction among any nuber of allies in range until the start of the next [Adventurer Step]. {lb} * {a} Heaven Piercer {/a}  (Primary, Ranged 10) You deal 6d6+6 damage among any number of enemies in range. {lb} * {a} To Valhalla {/a} (Primary, Ranged 10) You heal 4d6+4 hit points. divided among any number of allies within range.

NameComponent [0].name: Odin, Lord of the Eternal Hall

TraitComponent [3].name: Elite Foe: Lord of the Corpse Hall
TraitComponent [3].desc: This character cannot be {b} Stunned {/b} and markerrs they have generated cannot be removed. Be sure to inform players of this before beginning the encounter.

TraitComponent [4].name: Survive and Receive Valhalla
TraitComponent [4].desc: Odin summons 2 [Gungnir] 3 spaces from themself at the start of each Round this Phase.

effects.Target:: All enemies on the encounter map
effects.Base Effect:: Odin remains stationary until the start of the 3rd round the deal 999 damage to all enemies
